title: Can we please, for fucks sake, get rid of Guinsoos, or Devour.
body:
So many champions have on hit skills, so many items have on hit effects. These items exacerbate a stupid mechanic. If not Guinsoos, then Devour needs to just go away. In what world should Jax or Yi get double procs on their on hit effects? In what world should Devour junglers kill baron at 20 minutes? Its bullshit. I'm not even going to bother with the rest of my promos. Why does one player get to steam roll a team, solo push a whole lane, and pretty much just auto attack to victory. 
 
  The worst part is they aren't even squishy. They need just those 2 items, then they can build all tank and roflstomp people. Its really dumb, Riot's game balance choices are dumb, and the game is quickly becoming dumb. Its like I play in the hopes of having fun like I used to, but then people pick on hit junglers and its just so depressing.

Regarding Devour, especially Sated, I wonder why Riot feels the item needs to exist. If you look at all the current Devour users that are dedicated junglers and played long enough you'll know that none of them even needed Devour or for Sated to be added and had other options aside for 1 champion. Warwick is the only champion that has historically not built anything else other than in rare cases (such as building Golem/Cinder but tank Warwick was nerfed due to him being nerfed for Devour), all the other devour users only use devour when it is the best option and they aren't even balanced around devour anyways.

Warwick, again, is the only one balanced around it. Yi was building Warrior until it was clear Sated out classes it, Shyv was buffed due to using Cinder but once it was clear Sated outclasses Cinder people started using it which now means she has to be nerfed ruining Cinder/tanky Shyv. Xin originally also used Warrior until Sated was added to Devour. Udyr has already been shown to function fine with Cinder and even now Echoes. There is no reason for the item to exist other than for Warwick, but even then, he's being changed and could be changed in a way to be fine without it. Devour has been around through multiple different forms with different numbers/effects, and in the end no one ever enjoyed any of its forms.

I don't even understand why Sated is a damn thing. It basically says to the enemy team, you better beat my team before I get sated, or you lose. Why the fuck are devourer junglers getting so much special treatment right now? Devourer used to be a risk versus reward item. You bought it assuming the risk that your team doesn't do too well and you end up not contributing much of anything, the reward was that if your team didn't feed their asses off, you actually mattered.  Now it's like, it's ok, as soon as I get to 30 stacks I can 1v1 anyone and splitpush for days. 

Fuck Devourer, Fuck Rageblade
